channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.7 (includes 16.0 – 16.6)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio 2019 version 16.7 (includes 16.0 – 16.6)

item.title: CVE-2020-1133|2024-08-04T06:25:01.292Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.7%20%28includes%2016.0%20%E2%80%93%2016.6%29
item.description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector improperly handles file operations. An attacker who successfully exploited this vulnerability could run processes in an elevated context.

An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by running a specially crafted application on the victim system.

The update addresses the vulnerability by correcting the way the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector handles file operations.

item.title: CVE-2021-43877|2024-08-04T04:10:17.113Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio%202019%20version%2016.7%20%28includes%2016.0%20%E2%80%93%2016.6%29
item.description: ASP.NET Core and Visual Studio Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
